attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Abolish Stamp duty on primary homes and incrementally increase it on 2nd, 3rd, 4th etc... homes.  Thus the people who can afford it pay it.  Locals who live in desirable holiday hotspots are not priced out the market by second home owners as the increased stamp duty on holiday and rental homes will keep the price lower.  1st time buyers can then get on the ladder.  Whats not to like about it? Unless of course your want lots of houses!

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.

However, there is an existing petition on the site which overlaps with the action requested in the extra detail of your petition:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/notostampduty/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
